aboutusintro.title: About Metalloid
aboutusintro.subtitle: Precision Engineering, Unmatched Performance
aboutusintro.description: Founded in 1998, Metalloid has emerged as a leading precision brass component manufacturer. We specialize in delivering high-quality, customized solutions for automotive, electrical, and pneumatic industries. Our commitment to innovation, quality, and customer satisfaction drives our continuous growth and technological advancement.

items.name: Michael Rodriguez
items.content: Metalloid's precision components have been crucial to our automotive systems. Their quality, consistency, and technical support are unparalleled in the industry.

items.name: Sarah Thompson
items.content: We've partnered with Metalloid for over a decade. Their ability to deliver custom electrical components with exceptional precision continues to impress us.
